metadata.title: eDoktor
metadata.description: The national digital health platform of Albania

description: Book appointments, manage prescriptions, and access your public health data

title: Albania’s complete national
digital health platform
header.description: A single, unified digital gateway where citizens, doctors, institutions, and emergency services connect seamlessly. Built with advanced technology, strong security, and a human-centered approach.
header.info: Technology that strengthens institutions. Digitalization that empowers citizens. Read more on

points.title: Trust and credibility
points.description: Developed using international health IT standards, secure cloud architecture, data encryption, and best practices in digital health transformation.

points.title: Modern healthcare experience
points.description: A platform designed to simplify citizens’ lives, improve medical workflows, and empower Albania’s health institutions with real-time data and digital tools.

points.title: Connected with Digital Health Record
points.description: With eDoctor, citizens gain immediate access to their complete Digital Health Record, offering a fully integrated overview of their health history.

title: A modern digital health
ecosystem for the entire country
healthcare.description: eDoctor is Albania’s most advanced and comprehensive digital health platform, designed to unify all major healthcare services into one secure, efficient, and user-friendly system. It empowers citizens, supports doctors, and strengthens public institutions through technology.

title: Efficient referral and
specialist care
items.description: Find trusted specialists, browse available time slots, and easily book appointments in public hospitals. All schedules and details are automatically synced with your health record.
items: Book specialist appointments in public hospitals
Receive clear instructions and visit details

title: Unified clinical
history
items.description: Your diagnoses, past treatments, test results, imaging records, and vaccination status are automatically organized into a unified timeline, giving doctors a clear and accurate picture of your health. Specialists automatically see the patient’s:

title: A unified suite of
digital health services
header.description: eDoktor brings together all essential healthcare services into one seamless, secure and user-friendly platform. Each service is designed to simplify the patient journey, support medical professionals
header.description-full: eDoktor brings together all essential healthcare services into one seamless, secure and user-friendly platform. Each service is designed to simplify the patient journey, support medical professionals. The mobile app offers institutions the data they need to deliver efficient and high-quality care.

items.title: Access to primary care
items.description: Citizens can communicate with their family doctor through:

items.title: Secure communication
items.description: Private, encrypted messaging with your doctor.

items.title: 1-to-1 phone calls
items.description: Direct phone consultations with your family doctor.

items.title: HD video consultations
items.description: High-quality video calls for detailed medical advice.

items.title: Smart appointment scheduling
items.description: No queues, no repeated visits. The system provides:

items.title: Real-time availability
items.description: See when your doctor is online and ready to assist.

items.title: Booking and rescheduling
items.description: Easily book or change your appointment with your doctor.

items.title: Automatic reminders
items.description: Receive timely reminders for visits, vaccinations, etc.

items.title: Integrated documentation
items.description: Every diagnosis, medical note, and prescription is automatically stored in the Digital Health Record, ensuring continuity of care and complete transparency.

title: A complete suite
of healthcare features
header.description: eDoktor gives patients instant access to essential healthcare services — all in one easy-to-use app. From appointment booking to digital prescriptions, the app is built to modernize the entire care journey and reduce workload.

items.title: Nationwide access to diagnostics
items.description: Citizens can schedule:

items.title: Laboratory tests
items.description: Book tests at nearby facilities with real-time availability.

items.title: Radiography
items.description: Quickly schedule X-ray exams at public clinics.

items.title: CT & MRI scans
items.description: Easily arrange CT or MRI appointments with specialists.

items.title: Preventive check-ups
items.description: Book routine screenings and preventive health exams.

items.title: Digital delivery of results
items.description: All results are:

items.title: Delivered directly
items.description: Results are delivered directly inside the mobile app

items.title: Stored in Health Record
items.description: Stored permanently in the Digital Health Record

items.title: Accessible anytime
items.description: Accessible anytime by the patient or authorized doctors

title: Digital marketplace
of pharmacies
booking.description: Order medicines online and get fast home delivery. Track your orders and receive real-time updates inside the app.

title: Medical history,
always with you
medical-history.description: eDoktor automatically syncs data from clinics, hospitals, pharmacies, and your doctors to give you a complete, reliable medical history.

title: National
Emergency (127/112)
emergency-call.description: Smarter, faster emergency response. This improves response time, accuracy, and life-saving decision-making.
items: Medical history is displayed to authorized staff

title: Safe, signed
always available
prescriptions.description: Doctors issue prescriptions digitally with eDoktor. Prescriptions remain securely stored in the citizen’s Digital Health Record.
items: CZero risk of misreading or loss

title: Complete vaccination
oversight
vaccinations.description: Track your doses, access verified certificates, receive reminders, and share your medical records with clinics or schools.

help: We help organisations succeed with their most important
